page.title: 02Where people go to work.
page.content: Most people I asked, said their parents worked out of the area. So people can't have a job. Eight of the children said their parents work out of the area and they all need cars. All the people who go to work all need cars because we have no regular bus service or ferries.We have one private bus on Monday, it goes to Ledbury and one on a Wednesday, it goes to Gloucester. Most people go to work in Gloucester or Tewkesbury because Tewkesbury and Gloucester are the nearest towns to Pendock. Ledbury is also near but there are not very many jobs there.
